item.title: The bank in Beirut provides live video conferencing services
item.description: Bank Audi has established a new flagship branch called “Novo” in Beirut Central District’s Palladium Building. This branch is open every day of the year from 10 am to 10 pm and provides customers with interactive banking services. In addition to smart ATMs offering services like cash withdrawals, cash and check deposits, and credit card payments, the branch introduces a first-of-its-kind feature in Lebanon: Interactive Teller Machines (ITMs). These ITMs enable customers to connect with personal tellers through live video conferencing.
